title: Question about downloading League.
body:
I'm currently re downloading league, but every now and then it would 'hiccup' for about like 5 seconds and go back to normal.

However when the internet stops for a sec, the Kbps goes all the way down to 0, and never comes up again. (Yes I have waited 15min)

So I'm forced to start all over again. {{item:3070}} 

Is there anything I can do when my internet hiccups and my Kbps sticks at zero ?

Here's what I've tried
- Disabling UAC
- Putting League of Legends as an exception on my firewall
- Disabling Peer to Peer transfer
- Waiting it out

Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated
- James

replies.body:
What I try is refreshing my connection when that happens, ie. disconnect your internet for a few seconds and then reconnect it. It won't get it to work the moment you reconnect, but it does usually drastically reduce it's recovery time.

Best of luck.
